title: Senegal Raises $1 Billion in Oversubscribed Regional Bond Sale
description: Senegal raised 560 billion CFA francs ($1 billion) in a regional bond sale that was extended by several days, as the government faces funding pressures after a hidden-debt scandal limited access to international capital markets.
